main event: One object round, bigger than a basketball, observed for 5 minutes in Great Neck, New York.
interesting points: The object had spines sticking out and did not leave a vapor trail., The object was observed moving in a circle before changing course from North to South., The sighting was made under clear weather conditions., The report states that due to sporadic ionospheric conditions, insufficient data was collected., The sighting concluded with 'Insufficient Data for Evaluation.'
sighted object: one round object, bigger than a basketball
witness description: a 15-year-old from Great Neck, New York
